channel.title: David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content on David J Nevin

item.title: Critique
item.description: Critique Wheel The Critique Wheel is a free critique exchange for fiction writers. The ‘wheel’ is an on-going project and I’m improving it as I learn the skills required. If you’re a writer of short fiction and you want to improve your craft, the ‘wheel’ is a great place to start. One of the best ways to improve is to get and give critique.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
